game.name: PawlleyBall
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: PawlleyBall is a cute volleyball game where cats and dogs face off in quick 1v1 matches. Jump, dive, and spike to score against opponents on colorful, stylized courts. Simple controls and lively rallies make it fun to pick up and replay.
game.shortDescriptionEn: PawlleyBall is a cute volleyball game where cats and dogs face off in quick 1v1 matches. Jump, dive, and spike to score against opponents on colorful, stylized courts. Simple controls and lively rallies make it fun to pick up and replay.
